details.desc: Perched upon her shrine, priestess Tsukiko looks on as her foxes come with offerings that they've collected. Absorbing the offerings provides her with the energy to protect the shrine from dark forces as she patiently awaits the return of a certain samurai.
details.info: Perched upon her shrine, priestess Tsukiko looks on as her foxes come with offerings that they've collected. Absorbing the offerings provides her with the energy to protect the shrine from dark forces as she patiently awaits the return of a certain samurai.

details.desc: Awaken from her restful slumber, Lilith gets herself dressed up with the help of her loyal servants. She flies out of her room, ever eager to gather dark energy from her victims and gain even more strength and beauty in the process.
details.info: Awaken from her restful slumber, Lilith gets herself dressed up with the help of her loyal servants. She flies out of her room, ever eager to gather dark energy from her victims and gain even more strength and beauty in the process.

details.desc: Though Ibara entered this world with the terrifying appearance of a demon, beneath it all, she found meaning through aiding humanity. Clad in splendid and dazzling attire, preceded by the sound of her light footfalls, Ibara uses her power to aid humankind to this day.
details.info: Though Ibara entered this world with the terrifying appearance of a demon, beneath it all, she found meaning through aiding humanity. Clad in splendid and dazzling attire, preceded by the sound of her light footfalls, Ibara uses her power to aid humankind to this day.

details.desc: Lilith: she who rules the night. There are none among the denizens of the underworld who do not know her name. Lilith's overwhelming power demands her both fear and respect, although there seems to be something a bit different about her outfit tonight. Drawn forth by the sweet temptations she offers, those who dwell in this dark realm rejoice. Knowing the banquet she's provided will vanish with the dawn, they eagerly partake, staining the deep hours of the night an ever-blacker shade as their voices echo in the dark.

details.desc:
Everything that lives is designed to end.
We are perpetually trapped in a never ending spiral of life and death.
Is this a curse? Or some kind of punishment?
I often think about the god who blessed us with this cryptic puzzle… and wonder if we’ll ever get the chance to kill him.

details.desc: The roar of monsters, the cries of the people, and flames that scorch the sky. In a town enveloped by chaos, monsters try to attack helpless citizens. But then comes a sudden roar of thunder. Before the wave of monsters stands a master of lightning - a small girl who fights powerful enemies with her companions.

details.desc: In one particular world, it is said there is certain holiday season where families spend time together and give gifts to one another. In this vision, Ayaka comes up with a big surprise to celebrate, in hopes of pleasing Master Sakura. Ayaka shows Sakura a finished candy house and the two of them explore it together. Thanks to her, the holiday season turns out to be both precious and delicious!

details.desc: In one particular world, it is said there is one night of the year when it is customary to give gifts to one another. Surrounded by the festive lights of the city is a vision of Ayaka, happiness beaming on her face as she carries a tower of presents in her hand. Were they gifts she received, or are they gifts to be given to a special someone?

details.desc: Cleome prepares for a festival in another world known as the lunar festival by rehearsing her performance on a traditional stringed instrument. While playing, she is struck by inspiration as petals fall from a nearby tree. She breaks into a graceful dance while holding her katana, slicing the petals in the mere blink of an eye.

details.desc: At a major turning point, a knight focuses his spirit as he bathes in the sunlight rising from beyond the base of a mountain. He asks himself once again what it is that he must accomplish. The blade of his beloved sword, illuminated in the sunlight, reflects the determination in his gaze.

details.desc: Dancer and assassin. Today, a woman with two faces continues to swing her daggers to help the people of the world. Whether it be the step of a dance or the glint of her blade, her audience greets her with warm applause.

details.desc: Abigail eagerly rushes out of her laboratory to showcase her latest creation to the public. Using her controller, she skillfully maneuvers her drone in an amazing performance. By doing this show, she hopes that others can come to love drones as much as she does.

details.desc: She continues to stand on the front lines with the shield bestowed upon her by the king. With her sustained diligence and unfailing effort as a knight, her shield has become in both name and substance the "Sacred Shield" that protects the capital.

details.desc: Despite the persecution she faced at the hands of her fellow villagers, Melissa has taken it upon herself to look after those who have fallen ill. Being the only one to miraculously have immunity against the disease that plagues her village, she can care for the sick without worry of falling ill herself, and she works tirelessly to ensure everyone under her watch is as comfortable as possible.

details.desc: To protect her family and the warmth she has found with them, Mid swings the spears that she trained with while in the Orders. The sight of her spears raining from the heavens is sure to strike fear into any and all enemies on the ground below.

details.desc: At once both ethereal in its beauty, yet possessed of a might powerful enough to turn all the land into a frigid icescape, the ice magic Mediena commands features prominently in the multitude of tales surrounding her. Ever in pursuit of the true essence of magic, she continues to put all who dare stand in her way on ice.

details.desc: An enigmatic man who is the spitting image of Rain. He appeared unheralded in Paladia and plotted to bring the world to heel with his devastatingly omnipotent magical prowess. Though he remains shrouded in mystery, one thing is known beyond a doubt: the tremendous power at his fingertips is a threat to the peace of the world.

details.desc: During his quest for vengeance, a man named Yuki faints beneath a sacred tree. Ibara, the demon residing within the tree, draws her sword and makes quick work of the approaching soldiers. Using her power, she grants the wish of his lost family–for him to find happiness, and not simply revenge.

details.desc: During his travels, dark knight Duane happens to stumble upon a monster stuck in a trap. Although his blade is slowly eating away at his mind, he maintains control long enough to free the monster and mend the monster's wound. Perhaps one day he can finally overcome the darkness and make its power his own.

details.desc: Precious little is known about the Frostlord. Though the rumors regarding the true identity of the man who lies behind the armor are no few in number and just as varied, the warrior known for his unquenchable thirst for combat spoke most eloquently of his own battle prowess above all else—his skill a testament to the veracity of his claims.

details.desc: In order to fulfill his duty as a Warrior of the Crystal, Wylk brings the full might of the Ancestral Dragon residing in his body to bear as one of the Dracosooth. A single punch of his is certain to completely and mercilessly obliterate any who bars his path, as it can pulverize even meteorites of gargantuan proportions.

details.desc: Nora and her brother reach the deepest part of an ancient ruin believed to house a powerful treasure. They find an artifact emitting mysterious violet-colored energy and Nora goes to retrieve it, but her brother is suddenly attacked by a ferocious monster. Nora manages to absorb the mighty power of the artifact and returns to help her brother, but it is too late...

details.desc:
With wonderful dance skills and never-ending positivity, the beautiful Addison charms everyone in her path.
It is rumored that, even before her arrival, she had fans in Ardra who somehow followed her exploits, but the truth of this will likely remain a mystery.

details.desc: After being sealed in a crystal where he was constantly exposed to humanity's negative emotions, a certain sage began to hate all forms of life. Now all that remains within him is the desire to destroy the repulsiveness that is humanity, and with it, the false sun known as "Rain." To reach liberation by returning all to nothingness–that is the one and only truth he embraces.

details.desc: To stay a surging wave of monsters, the military strategist unleashes roaring white rapids. To protect the peaceful lives of the citizens, the military strategist spares no effort in demonstrating the brilliance of his mind to ease the weight of the world shouldered by his friends who stand at the frontlines.

details.desc: A young man finds himself in a predicament among the burning buildings, face-to-face with a young woman enwrapped in a pitch-black aura. However, just as her blade is about to deal the finishing blow, Elena and the rest of her comrades come to his aid. No matter what past the two might have had, Elena refuses to just stand by and watch.

details.desc:
Richt could not believe his eyes.
Eithne, a dear friend he grew up with and wanted nothing more than to protect, had now turned her blade against him. Even cornered at the end of Eithne's dark enshrouded blade, Richt cannot bring himself to draw his own blade against her.

details.desc: Day after day, this samurai's blade is stained red with the blood of the wicked as she endeavors to fulfill her duty to her master and purge the world of darkness. Although her own flesh and blood fell into the very darkness she means to eradicate, she swore herself to the path of the blade.

details.desc: The thoughts and feelings contained within the armor respond to Rain's conviction. The Aether he releases both shields his allies and dispels Dioxus's miasma, while the two swords he wields cuts down all enemies in his path.

details.desc: Basking in bunniferous company are Esther and Sylvie, enjoying a blessed breather from battling the baddies that toil to bring about world obliteration.

details.desc: A certain scholar is reading in the library when it is suddenly attacked by a mysterious hooded figure. In an attempt to destroy as many texts as possible, the figure unleashes a flurry of flames, only to have his plan quite literally backfire against the scholar's powerful magic. With his quick thinking and quicker magic, Kir manages to prevent further damage to the library.

Although her family may have been a bit unorthodox, her parents were quite loving, and to this day she thinks of them fondly.

details.desc: His unwavering gaze, fixed firmly on the future, is a beacon of hope for the masses who look to him as a shining paragon. Those who follow in his footsteps are nigh endless—perhaps because he too treads the path of a man who commands the utmost respect and honor.

details.desc: A serendipitous spark sees these two become fast friends, and they set forth together on a journey to discover the uncharted future. Their way is filled with the resplendent light of hope, and the wonders that await them at the end of their travels are certain to be delightful.

details.desc: With one swing of his blade, this silent swordsman weaves the waters; with two, he summons a tsunami to crush his foes and swallow all in its path. To control and refine his enormous power, he never fails to train every single day.

details.desc: Richt, having received the blessing of the Light Crystal, swings his sword to defeat evil. His gaze is unclouded and unwavering, for he now sees the path his conviction bids him walk. The fate that awaits him, however, is a cruel one indeed.

details.desc: An automaton who perpetually wondered about the human heart. Gathering together the thoughts entrusted to her by her companions, she unleashes the ultimate blast of power. Although she has yet to understand the human heart completely, she thinks she feels a warmness in her chest from the bonds she has forged.

But while her eyes stalk her prey in the dark of night, they look to the world spreading far beyond the horizon.

His legacy would live on through the next generation of archers, who aspired to someday surpass him in strength and protect the village from any threats.

details.desc: Steal from the rich and give to the poor—that is the rule Xon lives by. His daggers move with a swiftness one would never guess was honed on the streets. As for who taught him such polished techniques...only his beloved teddy bear Patches knows.

details.desc: The elder of a pair of demons born from chaos, Lucius's visage contorts with unbridled rage as he tears asunder those who provoke his contempt, though the truly perceptive may see a measure of euphoria beneath his anger. Should they witness his arrogance and brutality first-hand, even the mightiest of demons would kneel before him.

details.desc: With the formidable strength of his Regalia and the Miasma that emanates from it, Dioxus—the former Veritas of the Dark—has Rain and the others cornered. It is unclear what fate will befall them, as even the strongest warrior would be forced to his knees by the might of such power.

details.desc: After receiving the strength of her fellow warriors, Elena is bestowed with the blessing of the Rainbow Crystal, becoming the leader of the Fundamental Forces. The curtain now rises over their final battle with the Dark Crystal...

details.desc: Eithne's dreams of peace vanish into the shadows after she is possessed by darkness. She stands before the Warriors of the Crystal with overwhelming strength powered by negative emotions.
details.info: Eithne's dreams of peace vanish into the shadows after she is possessed by darkness. She stands before the Warriors of the Crystal with overwhelming strength powered by negative emotions.

details.desc: Poppy lets her heart guide her brush, unconcerned with what others think of her art. However, it's the creativity and genuineness of her finished masterpiece that fills the hearts of those who view it with a curious warmth.
details.info: Poppy lets her heart guide her brush, unconcerned with what others think of her art. However, it's the creativity and genuineness of her finished masterpiece that fills the hearts of those who view it with a curious warmth.

details.desc: One of the most influential members of the Orders, Hyoh once worked with a partner by his side. While said partner may have been a mere machine, there was still an undeniable bond between the two, and their strength combined allows Hyoh to attain the ultimate power.
details.info: One of the most influential members of the Orders, Hyoh once worked with a partner by his side. While said partner may have been a mere machine, there was still an undeniable bond between the two, and their strength combined allows Hyoh to attain the ultimate power.

details.desc: Wilhelm was a general of the Zoldaad Empire whose name resounded across the battlefield. One wouldn't imagine that his combat experience and large exterior housed such a kind soul, and he left behind the foundation of a new Zoldaad as his legacy.

details.desc: Although Elena, Warrior of the Azure Crystal, possesses strong qualities as a warrior, she never forgoes the opportunity to hone her skills. Having awoken a newfound power of the Crystal, she takes up her sword and shield as she continues her fight to protect the people against evil.

details.desc: Malphasie, a mysterious woman who lives with a murder of crows, soars the sky in a gale of pitch-black wings and unleashes a fierce blast of wind.
details.info: Malphasie, a mysterious woman who lives with a murder of crows, soars the sky in a gale of pitch-black wings and unleashes a fierce blast of wind.

details.desc: With his mechanical partner Runda at his side, the warrior Taivas boasts the best sword in Elmont. He extinguishes any and all foes with the flames that rise with each swing of his blade.

details.desc: The long-awaited appearance of a metal cactuar. He flew onstage feeling a strong obligation to provide experience to vision cards but fled backstage and ran home after noticing the spotlight.
